A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really loved it. I'm really not sure what the problem is\, since I thoroughly enjoyed the movie. Maybe because I came in with knowledge of Star Wars only from the movies and a bit of osmosis\, as well as not entering any discussions prior to watching\, but I really enjoyed it even while looking for flaws. Sure\, there are flaws\, but the strength of the movie trumps the flaws. I was grinning in excitement for the entire movie - I thoroughly enjoyed it\, so I'm not sure what's all the fuss is.
